title: I got killed by something I don't know what
body:
So I was playing league and this Yi did a lot of damage to me and then I escaped but then Lux did something. 

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/458025731671457822/513839639933747200/unknown.png

who is isabelleee? Am I just dumb or what?

replies.body: the death recap has always been buggy for as long as i remember almost nothing in it is reliable. if you showed a clip of what happened then we could tell you.
"isabelleee" is the summoner name of the player who killed you ([match](https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2912611554/234204975?tab=overview)).
looks like an AOE arcane comet
One time my friend got killed by {{item:3285}} effect. It showed the same thing. The attack hit me and killed him due it's 100 stacks ability.
